Package com.cloudhopper.mc.annotations

package com.cloudhopper.mc.annotations
Provides annotations for declaring cloud functions and API metadata.

These annotations are used by application developers to describe how their functions should be deployed and integrated with external platforms.

  • Function - marks a class as a deployable function
  • Schedule - defines time-based triggers
  • ApiOperation - adds HTTP metadata for API gateway integration
  • Klasse
    Beschreibung
    ApiOperation
    Provides metadata about an HTTP-accessible function for API gateway integration.
    ApiOperation.ApiOperationAttribute
    Constants representing attribute names of this annotation.
    Function
    Marks a class as a deployable cloud function.
    Function.FunctionAttribute
    Constants representing the attribute names of Function.
    Schedule
    Declares that the annotated function should be triggered on a schedule.
    Schedule.ScheduleAttribute
    Constants representing the attribute names of Function.
